    Your free Lykke MasterCard is on the way!

    648 People ahead

    Good news! You'll receive a welcoming bonus once you activate your card.

    Here's how you can get your card and a bonus on it:

    1. Download the Lykke Wallet app and register there. Note, it's available only for Android and iOS.
    2. Complete successfully the KYC verification process. To initiate it, tap on the sign on any fiat currency in the app
    3. Make sure you are living in one of these countries.
    4. Share the invitation code you’ll find below on your social media pages and privately.

    Benefits
    Explore the World of Financial Opportunities

    Easily access your equity.

    You’ve made money, now enjoy it! The new Lykke Card gives you free and clear access to the funds in your Lykke Wallet. It puts all of your currencies in your hands.

    Shop. Play. Treat.

    Surprise your mother with a full tank of gas. Take your nephew to the movies. Send flowers to your boss. Lykke Card can be used to purchase anything, anywhere Visa or MasterCard are accepted — in stores, online, and via mobile.

    Travel anywhere and feel like a local.

    Get your hands on local currency at millions of ATMs worldwide. Wherever you see the Visa/MasterCard stickers, your Lykke funds are in reach. For business and pleasure.

    Trade up to the lowest exchange rates.

    Lykke Card holders enjoy the lowest friction in the industry. Lykke’s proprietary Alpha Engine guarantees the best exchange rates possible, saving you money on every purchase.

    SWIFT is SLOW…

    ... and Lykke Card is like cash with wings. Send money faster and more easily than ever with Lykke Card. Forget about those clunky bank codes and smile while your money zips to its destination.

    24/7 + 360º = 8-)

    Manage your account, monitor your activity, and track your purchases via the Lykke Card mobile phone app. Anytime. Anywhere.

    Safe and secure.

    Lykke Wallet and Lykke Exchange are trusted by traders and investors worldwide. The pioneering Lykke Card is protected by Visa and MasterCard suite of security features, including fraud detection and zero liability. Even better, Lykke uses rock solid blockchain technology for audit trails.

    Invite people to Lykke

    Please enter e-mail of your friend:

    Invite people to Lykke

    Here are bonus details

    The more you share the code, the higher is the chance that at least two of your contacts will register and complete the KYC procedure, which is a necessary condition for you to become eligible to receive a free card.

    Once the three conditions are fulfilled (you can see your progress on this page), you will be placed in the queue of future Lykke Visa cardholders (*)!


    If a user starts the application process, completes successfully the KYC procedure but fails to fulfill one or both of the remaining conditions, he/she is still eligible to get his/her card, but upon paying a card issuance fee.

    All Lykke users who participate in Lykke Visa referral program, will receive a bonus of 5 EUR / 5 GBP / 5 USD on their Lykke Visa cards after activating their cards, depending on the spending currency of their cards.

    This is a limited offer! The number of cards is limited to 1000 pieces. The eligible applications are placed in a queue in chronological order. So, hurry up!


    (*) Shipping fees are excluded from the promo offer, they will be charged from the client’s account according to Lykke fees policy
